title: Product Research - META ads library
job_overview:
Rate: $4/hour
Start: ASAP
Type: Gig

We are looking for a Product Researcher to help find winning products using the Meta Ads Library. You will work with our fashion e-commerce brand and report your findings weekly.

Responsibilities
- Use Meta Ads Library to find trending products and ads
- Research competitors in the fashion niche
- Share clear reports of your research

Requirements
1) At least 1 year experience with Meta Ads Library
2) Experience with dropshipping
3) Knowledge of the fashion/clothing niche
4) Reliable, focused, and can start quickly

How to Apply
1) Answer these questions in your message:

- Do you have experience with Meta Ads Library?
- Do you have dropshipping experience?
- Have you worked in the fashion niche?
- Do you have Shopify experience?

2) Send a short introduction video of yourself, explaining your experience.

I'm looking forward to review your application. Thank you in advance!


Best regards,
Tess
